sentences.english: The workers torn down the old house and built a new one in its place.
sentences.chinese: 工人們拆毀舊屋，並在原址上另蓋新屋。

sentences.english: Yuan Dadu for the site of the Great Temple of Wanning Tianshou Center Court.
sentences.chinese: 原址爲元大都大天壽萬寧寺之中心閣。

sentences.english: The outer harbour site will be cleared before the end of this year, and restructured for a new casino project - "Oceanus".
sentences.chinese: 新八佰伴原址於下半年改爲海洋之神娛樂場項目。

sentences.english: The ruined portion of the Pentagon was rebuilt and reoccupied within a year.
sentences.chinese: 五角大廈的原址上將會重建並會在一年內落成。

sentences.english: Now begin rehabilitation at the site of the Ming Dynasty characteristics Longbing House.
sentences.chinese: 現已在原址動工復建具有明代特色總兵府。

sentences.english: The greyhound bus origin museum is located in hibbing minnesota .
sentences.chinese: 灰狗汽車公司原址博物館座落在明尼蘇達的希賓鎮。

sentences.english: Design plot of land is the site of caustic soda plant in Taizhou, which belongs to the brownfields range.
sentences.chinese: 設計地塊原址爲台州燒鹼廠，屬於棕地改造的範圍。

sentences.english: And the site was then plowed over by the local inhabitants who simply took it back to agriculture again.
sentences.chinese: 原址被當地人犁過，又用做農業用地了。

definition: to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)
old site/site of sth (palace, ancient state etc) that no longer exists
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
Xinjian county in Nanchang 南昌, Jiangxi
to be situated/to be located (of a building)
